Class MessageGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.com.hexcore.vrmeeting_hostserver.communication.protocol.MessageGenerator

  • public final class MessageGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    A Utility Class used to generate Message objects that are sent from the server to a client
    Author:
    Psymj1 (Marcus)
    See Also:
    VRMeeting Messaging Protocol

      • generateAuthenticationRequestMessage

        public static Message generateAuthenticationRequestMessage()
        Returns:
        Returns a Message whose signal is AUTH and payload is empty

      • generateValidatedMessage

        public static Message generateValidatedMessage()
        Returns:
        Returns a Message whose signal is VAL and payload is empty

      • generateNotValidatedMessage

        public static Message generateNotValidatedMessage()
        Returns:

      • generateRequestMeetingIDMessage

        public static Message generateRequestMeetingIDMessage()
        Returns:

      • generateUDMMessage

        public static Message generateUDMMessage(User user)
        Generate a UDM message with a payload which contains the information of the user who is passed in
        Parameters:
        user - The user to encode into the payload of the message
        Returns:
        A UDM message containing the given user's information in the payload

      • generateLeftMessage

        public static Message generateLeftMessage(int userID)
        Generate a LEFT message with the ID of the user who left in the payload
        Parameters:
        userID - The ID of the user who left
        Returns:
        A message with the LEFT signal and the userID encoded in UTF-8 in the payload
